.
Payment in Philippine Cases
Claims authorized for Veterans of the U.S. Army and Regular Scouts are paid in dollars.
Persons who enlisted under Section 14,
PL 79-190
(The Armed Forces Voluntary Recruitment Act of October 6, 1945), in the Philippine Scouts, Commonwealth Army of the Philippines, or Guerilla Service are to be paid at a rate in Philippine pesos equivalent to $.50 for each dollar authorized under law.
Note
:Â  The Manila Treasury Disbursing Office makes the payment.
